name: Legend of Forest Bat
description:
Control:

if you use a desktop, 

  • use the arrow to move
  • space to shoot 
  • CTRL to speed up

In 2030, humankind created robots with advanced intelligence systems A.I. It replaces expert and formal human tasks and it called Super A.I
In 2033, Super A.I. was infected by a virus that replaced their neuron node system and made an imbalanced data model.
In 2035, There is an anomaly that makes most robot attack living things including humans, Animals, and plant
In 2036, the survivor hides in the underground banker.
Humans use mutant bats to explore underground places and restore plants to build a forest.
